entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
